author: leobeltra
body:
#### PR description:

Added two new macros: `SOA_METHODS` and `SOA_CONST_METHODS`. The user can declare functions with an arbitrary number of input and template arguments inside these macros. The functions will act on the elements (rows) of the SoA. A static assert has been added to ensure that there are no multiple calls to these macros within the main macro.

#### PR validation:

Added a unit test which passes.
title: Added macro for generating element-wise methods
